DOC.brief_summary: In recent studies using virtual reality has been proposed as a non pharmacological methods for pain relief but until this time , its effects has not been assessed on pain and anxiety during episiotomy repair. To determine the effectiveness of virtual reality Glasses on pain and anxiety in Primiparity women during episiotomy repair.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Virtual Reality Glasses on Pain and Anxiety
